import React from "react"; import { Link, useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; import NotificationDropdown from "components/Dropdowns/NotificationDropdown.js"; import UserDropdown from "components/Dropdowns/UserDropdown.js"; export default function Sidebar() { const [collapseShow, setCollapseShow] = React.useState("hidden"); const history = useHistory(); const handleLogout = async () => { try { // Call the logout endpoint await axios.post('/api/personnel/logout'); // Clear any auth tokens or user data from localStorage localStorage.removeItem('token'); localStorage.removeItem('userData'); // Redirect to login page using history.push for React Router v5 history.push('/au/login'); } catch (error) { console.error("Logout failed:", error); // You could add some error handling here alert("Échec de la déconnexion. Veuillez réessayer."); } }; return ( <>
